title: Network Rebellion
outcome: Neighborhoods create their own communication networks, breaking free from Congress and Council control. Citizens use the new 'mesh' system for resource sharing and public truth commissions on BCI abuses. Oksana sides with the decentralizers, sparking a movement for total grassroots self-governance.

events.description: Local residents install mesh networking nodes, allowing neighborhoods to share information, coordinate supply deliveries, and bypass Congress communications. Resource shortages ease as cooperation flourishes.

Inspired by the mesh, public truth commissions emerge. Citizens use the network to record testimonies of abuses suffered under the BCI and post-amnesty chaos. Discussions reveal the extent of injustices and deepen solidarity.
Congress members attempt to restrict mesh access, fearing loss of control. Oksana defies the order, encouraging her local allies to join and expanding the mesh’s reach citywide.
With Oksana openly supporting the mesh, neighborhoods vote to dissolve local Congress chapters in favor of independent assemblies, rooting all governance at the street level.

Mass celebrations mark grassroots independence. In speeches, survivors of the BCI directly credit Halden’s early warnings against top-down rule, reframing his death as a sacrifice that made true autonomy possible.
